title: Watch: Man Builds Surprisingly Sturdy Hut Using Handmade Tools
text:
Tuesday, January 23, 2018 11:34
% of readers think this story is Fact. Add your two cents.
Primitive technology  means making things in the wild completely from scratch – using no modern tools or materials.
If you want a fire, use fire sticks. An axe, pick up a stone and shape it. A hut, build one from trees, mud, rocks, and other items. The challenge is seeing how far you can go without modern technology.
Watch this man from the appropriately named YouTube channel Primitive Technology build an A-frame hut.
